name: The Nun - Scary Forest House
description:
The church Nun has been possessed by a dark spirit. So she turned herself from Nun to a demon and start living in the scary forest. The rumors say the forest is under the scary nun. she is a victim of the darkest side. The wild animals and spirits roaming this midnight.

Your friend came to see the forest but he gets trapped by the evil. In this Evil House of Scary Nun, you have to keep injured mate save who is in the house. Find the clue and get rid of this scary forest. Hit the spelled animals to make the forest essence abandoned.

Features:
- Realistic Forest Environment.
- Survival theme.
- Scary gameplay with Sound Effects.
